channel.title: -Desolace 317 | Hunter | Dwarf multicannon | Glacors | Summoning | Dungeoneering
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i1202.photobucket.com/albums/bb367/aceofpking/EkYl0oY_zps9e7ea0cf.png[/img] Welcome to Desolace Advertisement page! Desolace is a 317 Runescape private server which strives for perfection, using the most effective system, and even driven handlers our game play is as smooth as it can possibly be. Our server is full multi-threaded, Countless hours writing content, but we surely also do spend a lot of time in performance boosting our server, so it can handle large amounts of players. We're new, however rapidly growing. Enjoy the pictures!
==================================================
Visit our website by clicking here: [url=http://Desolace.net]Desolace - #1 RSPS[/url]
================================================== [/center] Developers - Gabbe (Server) - Ace (Server and website) - Samy (Server) - Tyler(Website)
Staff:
~Owners: -ace -gabbe -samy ~Admins: -Tha Slayer ~Mods: -Darithum -RainTime -Vig -Sol
Staff Spots are open but please do not pm me about it earn it..
Features - No lag, 24-7. - Stable economy. - Fully Working dwarf multicannon - Perfectly working Hunter - Perfect combat - Revenants - 15+ bosses including Nex, Corporal beast, tormented demons and many others. - Two custom quests. - Full farming - Clan system with complete management(promoting, demoting, kicking, banning etc...) - Dungeoneering with mutliple floors - Summoning with all familiars - Newest/old hit marks - Glacors + Steadfast, Gaiven and Ragefire boots - Full pest control - Full Castle Wars - Full duel arena - Abysall whip vine - Bh pk system - Killstreak system - Hiscores - Perfect Ancient Curses. - Perfect korasi sword. - Slayer helm fully working - Completionist cape and Tokhaar-Kal cape - Overloads, prayer renewals, recover special potion and more. - All special attacks from ags to Dragon Pickaxe fully working. - Working renewal, augury & rigour & ring of vigour prayers - All npcs have a good variety of drops. - Woodcutting trees & mining ores respawn. - Advanced teleporting system with jewellery. - Vote4Reward - Active Community with professional forums. - Regular double exp/drops weekend. - Fully working abyss plus runecrafting pouches. - Enourmous variety of places where you can train skills & combat. - Perfect Switching. - Website based account management system - Regular community events & drop parties. - Bank pins
Pictures: [spoiler= Skilling] [IMG]http://i1202.photobucket.com/albums/bb367/aceofpking/Screenshot_22_zpse90f1f96.png[/img]

item.title: -Desolace 317 | Hunter | Dwarf multicannon | Glacors | Summoning | Dungeoneering
item.dc:creator: @Desolace Desolace
item.description:
@Desolace wrote:

[center]

EkYl0oY_zps9e7ea0cf.png732×94

Welcome to Desolace Advertisement page!
Desolace is a 317 Runescape private server which strives for perfection,
using the most effective system, and even driven handlers our game play is as smooth as it can possibly be. Our server is full multi-threaded, Countless hours writing content, but we surely also do spend a lot of time in performance boosting our server, so it can handle large amounts of players. We’re new, however rapidly growing. Enjoy the pictures!

==================================================

Visit our website by clicking here: Desolace - #1 RSPS

==================================================
[/center]
Developers

  • Gabbe (Server)
  • Ace (Server and website)
  • Samy (Server)
  • Tyler(Website)

Staff:

~Owners:
-ace
-gabbe
-samy
~Admins:
-Tha Slayer
~Mods:
-Darithum
-RainTime
-Vig
-Sol

Staff Spots are open but please do not pm me about it earn it…

Features

  • No lag, 24-7.
  • Stable economy.
  • Fully Working dwarf multicannon
  • Perfectly working Hunter
  • Perfect combat
  • Revenants
  • 15+ bosses including Nex, Corporal beast, tormented demons and many others.
  • Two custom quests.
  • Full farming
  • Clan system with complete management(promoting, demoting, kicking, banning etc…)
  • Dungeoneering with mutliple floors
  • Summoning with all familiars
  • Newest/old hit marks
  • Glacors + Steadfast, Gaiven and Ragefire boots
  • Full pest control
  • Full Castle Wars
  • Full duel arena
  • Abysall whip vine
  • Bh pk system
  • Killstreak system
  • Hiscores
  • Perfect Ancient Curses.
  • Perfect korasi sword.
  • Slayer helm fully working
  • Completionist cape and Tokhaar-Kal cape
  • Overloads, prayer renewals, recover special potion and more.
  • All special attacks from ags to Dragon Pickaxe fully working.
  • Working renewal, augury & rigour & ring of vigour prayers
  • All npcs have a good variety of drops.
  • Woodcutting trees & mining ores respawn.
  • Advanced teleporting system with jewellery.
  • Vote4Reward
  • Active Community with professional forums.
  • Regular double exp/drops weekend.
  • Fully working abyss plus runecrafting pouches.
  • Enourmous variety of places where you can train skills & combat.
  • Perfect Switching.
  • Website based account management system
  • Regular community events & drop parties.
  • Bank pins
